structure.unit: Manufacture And Sale Of Gas And Electricity

law.catch_line: Time For Filing Applications For Approval Of Sales Or Consolidations
law.text: All applications for the approval by the department of purchases and sales or consolidations under sections twenty-six, ninety-six, ninety-seven and one hundred shall be filed with the department within four months after the passage by the contracting companies of votes authorizing such purchase and sale or consolidation.
